name: Help Annie
description:
"Help Annie" is an adventurous interactive mystery thriller in the manner of a Messenger App Game – exciting, fantastic and full of suspense.
YOU are Annie's last and only hope, the choices YOU make may save Annette Lewis who is – instead of spending a once-in-a-lifetime holiday – confronted with a series of mysterious events.
Caught by the shadows of her past it is now a matter of life and death.

Play „Help Annie“ for free and unlock the full experience for a small price! There are no other costs or ads in the game!
